vivid3d.create_ellipsoid

vivid3d.create_ellipsoid(position: Py3DPoint = array([0., 0., 0.]), radii: Py3DPoint, num_of_meridians: int = 20, num_of_parallels: int = 20, major_axis: Py3DPoint, middle_axis: Py3DPoint, minor_axis: Py3DPoint, color: str = 'lightgray', alpha: float = 1.0, label: str = '') → vivid3d._vivid.Mesh
